abstract: Updated: Verizon Communications is in talks to buy Alltel for about $27 billion including the assumption of debt, creating the nation’s largest cellphone service company, people briefed on the matter said Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Updated: Verizon Communications is in talks to buy Alltel for about $27 billion including the assumption of debt, creating the nation’s largest cellphone service company, people briefed on the matter said Wednesday.

headline.main: Verizon in Talks to Buy Alltel
